price: (45) Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority[957]
arabic: ثُمَّ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: thumma arsalnā mūsā wa-akhāhu hārūna biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
